puzzle.help: 1. Shade some tiles according to the following rules: 2. Shaded tiles must not be orthogonally connected. 3. You can shade tiles with arrows and numbers. 4. All tiles which are not shaded must form an orthogonally continuous area. 5. A cell containing a number and an arrow tells you how many tiles are shaded in that direction. 6. However not all tiles that are shaded tell you lies.
